definitions.definition: something that is given to a person or an organization such as a charity, in order to help them; the act of giving something in this way

examples.text: The work of the charity is funded by voluntary donations.
The campaign has raised £200 000 through online donations.
Leave your donations with the staff on reception any time during opening hours.
The project is funded by public donation.
The charity has received over $10 million in donations.
a donation towards the building of a new hospital
We received a generous donation from the people of the local church.

definitions.definition: the act of allowing doctors to remove blood or a body organ in order to help somebody who needs it

examples.text: **Organ donation** has not kept pace with the demand for transplants.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin donatio(n-), from the verb donare, based on donum ‘gift’.
